rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Spatial entrance that adheres to Vastu principles with a north-west orientation. Minimalist yet functional corridor with natural lighting via floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan combined living and dining space featuring floor-to-ceiling glass walls ensuring abundant natural light. Integrates Brutalist aesthetics with raw concrete finishes.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen adjacent to the living area. Includes industrial design elements typical of Brutalism. Features built-in cabinetry and ample workspace.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a direct view towards the west for Vastu considerations. Minimalist design with raw concrete finishes, incorporating floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring ample daylighting and ventilation.
Entry door positioned according to Vastu norms with emphasis on energy flow.

garage.description: Two-car garage designed at the western side of the plot, ensuring easy access and adherence to local building regulations.
